name: 王清祿
objective:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
Course description
   This course aims to help students develop essential English communication skills in the globalized community. Of them, listening, reading, and basic grammar skills are focused on. Another aim is to prepare students for proficiency English tests such as TOEIC and IELTS. All these efforts are to develop students’ English communication skills in today’s globally competitive workplace.
